column2: ENGLISH
Give the Horn of Gondor to [Root.GetFirstName]
column3: Donner le Cor du Gondor à [Root.GetFirstName].

column2: I will pass on the Horn of Gondor to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] deserves it.
column3: Je vais donner le Cor du Gondor à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] le mérite.

column2: Give the Elessar to [Root.GetFirstName]
I will pass on the Elessar to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] deserves it.
column3: Je vais donner l'Elessar, l'Etoile du Soir, à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] le mérite.

column2: Give my Mithril chainmail to [Root.GetFirstName]
column3: Donner ma tunique en Mithril à [Root.GetFirstName].

column2: I will pass on my Mithril chainmail to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] deserves it.
column3: Je vais donner ma cotte de mailles en Mithril à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] le mérite.

column2: Give the Ring of Barahir to [Root.GetFirstName]
I will pass on the Ring of Barahir to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] could protect the inheritance of my family.
column3: Je vais donner l'Anneau de Barahir à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] saura protéger l'héritage de ma Maiheir.

column2: Give Narsil to [Root.GetFirstName]
column3: Donner les fragments de Narsil à [Root.GetFirstName].

column2: I will pass on Narsil to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] could protect the inheritance of Elendil.
column3: Je vais donner les fragments de Narsil à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] saura protéger l'héritage d'Elendil.

column2: Give the Ring of Durin to [Root.GetFirstName]
I will pass on the Ring of Durin to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] could protect the inheritance of my family.
column3: Je vais donner l'Anneau de Durin à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] saura protéger l'héritage de ma Maiheir.

column2: Give the Dwarf Ring to [Root.GetFirstName]
I will pass on the Dwarf Ring to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] could protect the inheritance of my House.
column3: Je vais donner l'Anneau des Nains à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] saura protéger l'héritage de ma Maiheir.

column2: Give the lesser ring to [Root.GetFirstName]
I will pass on the lesser ring to [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] could protect the inheritance of my House.
column3: @FIXME@ Je vais donner l'anneau à [Root.GetFirstName], [Root.GetSheHe] saura protéger l'héritage de ma Maiheir.
